title: Reduction and rearrangment of genetic material 1

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Meiosis reduces chromosome number and rearranges genetic information.
content.question: Explain how the reduction and rearrangement are accomplished in meiosis.

frqParts.text: Explain how the reduction and rearrangement are accomplished in meiosis.
